page.title: Composite Species Properties Pane
page.introduction: The species properties pane defines a composite species: it's name and annotation (can be typed in) and composition (can be edited using right mouse click only, no keyboard entering).
page.operations:
Species specification Using right mouse click, a user is able to
Add molecules that compose species
After molecules are added, possible issues are highlighted in red (see also 3 errors in problems tab - two errors because two binding sites have unspecified states, one error because molecules are not connected).
Specify how binding sites are connected
Specify states for binding sites. Note that only one error is detected - because molecules are already connected and one only one site has unspecified states.
